Previous play is really 1E6
$Great diving catch by Erstad, but injured ankle and was batted for in bottom of first; this was his first game back from the DL after three weeks

ej,guilo001,M,westj901,Obstruction call $Pie stopped at 3B, Pagan was caught between 2B and 3B as DeRosa headed to 2B; Uribe tagged out Pagan and then threw home where Pie was tagged out in a rundown; the umpires conferred and ruled that Uribe obstructed Pagan as he tried to go from 1B to 3B; the runners were put back on the bases and White Sox Mgr Ozzie Guillen calmly argued the play and told umpire crew chief Joe West: 'You are just going to have to run me.' Guillen was ejected by West
Debut game for Garrett Olson

$Twins catcher Mike Redmond left the game due to an injured head after being struck on the side of the head by Jim Thome's bat; Redmond received seven stitches at the ballpark; the bat also struck HP umpire Randy Marsh, who remained in the game
fan interference
$Granderson was standing off the bag and failed to get back when Uribe stopped the ball in the hole
White Sox catcher Toby Hall left the game due to an injured head

$McDonald and Clayton did not realize that McDonald was in the lineup as the starting shortstop. When Clayton took the field, he became an unannounced sub and McDonald was not available for the rest of the game. Toronto bench coach Ernie Whitt was demoted to first base coach over this incident.
